  • Uses of Monster in commandline

    Methods in commandline with parameters of type Monster
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private boolean
    BattleCommandLine.makeMove(GameEnvironment env, Monster enemy)
    Command line interface to make a move, either attacking (attack strings are displayed and one is chosen), using an item (delegated to InventoryCommandLine), switching the currently active monster in your team, or fleeing the battle.

  • Uses of Monster in game.monsters

    Subclasses of Monster in game.monsters
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DebuffMonster
    A special type of Monster, with a second attack which applies a debuff to the enemies damage.
    class 
    FlyingMonster
    A special type of Monster, with a fly move, that allows them to not take damage in the next turn.
    class 
    PoisonMonster
    A special type of Monster with a poison attack.
    class 
    RiskyMonster
    A special type of Monster, with a second attack which instant kills either the enemy or itself randomly.
    Methods in game.monsters with parameters of type Monster
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private String
    DebuffMonster.debuff(Monster enemy)
    Applies a debuff to the enemy for 3 turns of a third of this monster's attack damage.
    String
    DebuffMonster.makeMove(int move, Monster enemy)
    Performs debuff attack if move is 1, else calls base Monster makeMove().
    String
    FlyingMonster.makeMove(int move, Monster enemy)
    Makes fly move if move is 1, else calls base class method
    String
    Monster.makeMove(int move, Monster enemy)
    Makes a move based on an int move, for the base Monster class there is only one move, 0, which is a basic attack.
    String
    PoisonMonster.makeMove(int move, Monster enemy)
    If move is 1 makes poison attack, else makes base class move.
    String
    RiskyMonster.makeMove(int move, Monster enemy)
    Performs one shot attack if move is 1, else calls base Monster makeMove().
    String
    DebuffMonster.makeRandomMove(Monster enemy)
    50% chance to make a debuff attack, else makes a basic attack.
    String
    FlyingMonster.makeRandomMove(Monster enemy)
    Randomly makes fly move or base class attack, with 50% chance
    String
    Monster.makeRandomMove(Monster enemy)
    Same as makeMove, but makes a random move instead of taking a move integer to determine the move.
    String
    PoisonMonster.makeRandomMove(Monster enemy)
    Randomly makes poison attack or base class move with 50% probability of each.
    String
    RiskyMonster.makeRandomMove(Monster enemy)
    50% chance to make a one shot attack, else makes a basic attack.
    private String
    RiskyMonster.oneShot(Monster enemy)
    Has a 50% chance of one shotting the enemy and a 50% chance of oneshotting itself.
    private String
    PoisonMonster.poison(Monster enemy)
    The poison attack, dealing half this monster's attack damage to the enemy, and then adding a persistent damage attack of one fifth of this monster's total damage, which lasts for five turns.
